desc: Art House Lab is an inspiring children's art studio where beginning artists are encouraged to explore, connect, and create. We support artists ages 5- 16 with creative projects, art lessons, and mediums. A variety of techniques include drawing, painting, clay, fiber arts, printmaking, and construction.

layout.text: Welcome to Art House Lab: A place where a child's artistic confidence grows from a recipe of inspiration, magical experimentation, and a smidge of beautiful oops. Art is for everyone, so join us for a workshop and become part of our community today!
